## Checklist

Before submitting:

- [ ] I have checked that this documentation issue hasn't been reported already
- [ ] I have clearly identified what needs to be improved
- [ ] I have provided suggestions for improvement (if applicable)
- [ ] I have verified the issue exists in the latest version
